name: Mango Tree Counseling & Consulting
address: While a specific street address for all locations isn't provided, they serve the Philadelphia Metro area and the states of PA and NJ
description: This center focuses on the mental wellness of the Asian-American community, offering culturally responsive mental health care, workshops, and psychotherapy groups. They have therapists who speak Mandarin and Cantonese

name: Amy Huang at Melanated Women's Health
description: Amy Huang is an Asian therapist who provides therapy in both Cantonese Chinese and English. She has experience with first-generation Americans and BIPOC communities, focusing on cultural identity and intergenerational expectations

name: Psychology Today - Mandarin Therapists in Pennsylvania
description: This directory allows you to search for therapists who speak Mandarin in Pennsylvania. You can filter by location, specialties, and insurance

name: Psychology Today - Cantonese Therapists in Pennsylvania
description: This directory lists therapists who speak Cantonese in Pennsylvania, offering culturally responsive care

name: Chinese Therapists in Pennsylvania (Directory)
description: This website allows you to submit a request to be matched with pre-screened Chinese therapists in Pennsylvania
